mapper.select: select (select (ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Recv_Principal),#{sKey})) as signed)),0) + ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Recv_Interest),#{sKey})) as signed)),0)+ ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Repay_Overdue),#{sKey})) as signed)),0)+ ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Repay_Overdue_Interest),#{sKey})) as signed)),0)+ ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Repay_Penalty),#{sKey})) as signed)),0)) from Invest_Real_Income lri ) as incomeTotal, (select count(Member_ID) from member_info ) as countmember, (select ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Amount),#{sKey})) as signed)),0) from project_base_info pbi left join project_app_record par on par.Project_Base_ID =pbi.Project_Base_ID where par.Invest_Statu>=3 ) as totalLoanAmount , (select ifnull(Risk_Reserve_Fund,0) from System_Info_Set limit 1) as riskReserveFund

select pty.Pic_Icon,par.Reward_Icon,pbi.Project_Title,pbi.Amount,pbi.Deadline,pbi.Deadline_Type, pbi.Year_Rate,par.Reward_Rate, par.Rate_Add_Rate,replayway.name1,pap.Start_Date,pap.End_Date, par.Project_No, par.Apply_Id, par.Invest_Statu , par.Invest_Rate
from Project_App_Record par left join Project_App_Process pap on pap.Apply_Id=par.Apply_Id left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID left join ProjectBaseInfo pty on par.Project_ID=pty.Project_ID left join DICT replayway on replayway.code1= pbi.Repay_Way and replayway.tcode = 'DICT_HKFS' order by par.Invest_Statu asc ,pap.Start_Date desc limit 3

select pbi.Project_Title,par.Project_No,cta.Surplus_Time, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{sKey})) as signed) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount), #{sKey})) as signed) Trans_Discount, cta.Surplus_Time_Type,cta.Cta_Invest_Rate,replayway.name1 as repalyways, transStatu.name1 as transStatus,cta.CTA_Id,cta.Statu as transStatu,cta.End_Date, ((par.Rate_Add_Rate + pbi.Year_Rate)*1000000/CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount), #{sKey})) as signed)) as expectYearrate from Creditor_Trans_App cta left join Invest_Record ir on ir.Invest_Id = cta.Invest_Id left join Project_App_Record par on par.Apply_Id = ir.Apply_Id left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID left join ProjectBaseInfo pty on par.Project_ID=pty.Project_ID left join DICT replayway on replayway.code1= pbi.Repay_Way and replayway.tcode = 'DICT_HKFS' left join DICT transStatu on transStatu.code1= cta.Statu and transStatu.tcode = 'DICT_ZRZT' order by cta.Statu asc limit 6

select mi.Logname, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),#{sKey})) as signed) Invest_Amount from Invest_Record ir left join Member_Info mi on mi.Member_ID = ir.Member_ID
ir.IsValid=0
and dateformat(ir.Invest_Date,'%Y-%m')=dateformat(now(),'%Y-%m')
and YEARWEEK(date_format(ir.Invest_Date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now());
limit 6
